name: Rocket Girls!
description:
You need to control 11 rocket girls to fly into the space!

Avoid the asteroid and collect the resources. Also, when you have enough resource, you can type letter as show on the screen one by one to use special abilities!

Don't let them fall behind!

Made with Unity, Audacity, FamiTracker and MediBang Paint Pro.

Songs are made by me, but derived from Chinese pop music. 

v1.2 has tutorials and more balanced gameplay. The web version does not. I will udpate if after ludum dare.
